alert.note: Alert for Alcorn; Tishomingo (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 11 at 6:43PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Tishomingo, northeastern Alcorn, northeastern Fayette, Hardeman, McNairy, Hardin, southeastern Haywood, southern Madison and Chester Counties through 730 PM CDT... At 642 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Somerville to 8 miles north of Big Hill Pond State Park to Iuka. Movement was north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jackson, Corinth, Brownsville, Savannah, Henderson, Bolivar, Selmer, Iuka, Pickwick Landing State Park, J P Coleman State Park, Chickasaw State Park, Chickasaw State Forest, Big Hill Pond State Park, Whiteville, Somerville, Adamsville, Burnsville, Glen, Silerton and Pickwick Dam. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
